cause.description:
MTV was launched by the end of 1990. Thanks to a dynamic and creative crew, MTV has always been a forerunner in the Lebanese audiovisual sector. Its challenge was to innovate and its local production as SLCHI, Khallik Maana, Ciné Cinéphile, Mini Studio, MTV Sports, Chouf Halak, Kel Mayle Ayle are the best proof of its success. MTV also broadcasts major American series, TF1 and France 2 programs, CNN news, as well as Formula One, NBA, and UEFA Cup.
1. Bring MTV back
2. Freedom of Press.
cause.mission: Bring back MTV and Freedom of Press
cause.name: MTV | Lebanon
